name: Super Mario Maker 2: World Maker Update
summary:
Version 3.0.0 of Super Mario Maker 2.

Changes:

Adds a new set of Style Power-ups (SMB2 Mushroom, Frog Suit, Power Balloon, Super Acorn), Boomerang Flower, Cannon Box, Propeller Box, Red POW Box, Goomba Mask, Bullet Bill Mask, Mechakoopa, Larry, Iggy, Wendy, Lemmy, Roy, Morton, Ludwig, Cursed Key, and ON/OFF Trampoline.
Adds World Maker and Super Worlds.
Added a new opening animation.
Adds new Tags.
Players wearing a Dry Bones Shell stuck inside blocks can no longer jump out of the shell.
